match.schema:
type: object
        additionalProperties: false
        properties:
            allow_auto_manage:
                type: boolean
            dry_run:
                type: boolean
            meter:
                type: string
                enum:
                  - monitex
            price_transform:
                type: object
                additionalProperties: false
                properties:
                    to_external_units_coeff:
                        type: number
                    from_external_units_coeff:
                        type: number
                required:
                  - to_external_units_coeff
                  - from_external_units_coeff
            max_price_difference_percent:
                type: number
        required:
          - allow_auto_manage
          - price_transform
          - max_price_difference_percent
